text: allah unkalai (arampattil) palavinamana nilaimaiyil urpatti ceykiran. Antap palavinattirkup pinnar avane (valipa) palattaiyum kotukkiran. Anta palattirkup pinnar vayotikattaiyum, palavinattaiyum kotukkiran. (Ivvarellam) avan, tan virumpiyavaru (unkalai) akkukiran. Avan (anaittaiyum) nankarintavanum mikka arralutaiyavanum avan
